definitions.definition: Encoded computer instructions , usually modifiable (unless stored in some form of unalterable memory such as ROM ).
The human beings involved in warfare, as opposed to hardware such as weapons and vehicles.

main_definition: ( computing ) Encoded computer instructions , usually modifiable (unless stored in some form of unalterable memory such as ROM ).
secondary_definitions: ( military ) The human beings involved in warfare, as opposed to hardware such as weapons and vehicles.
